mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, ORDER_DETAIL_PRICE, STATUS FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, USER_ID, ORDER_NO, PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, ORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, ORDER_DETAIL_PRICE, STATUS FROM( SELECT NVL(OD.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(OD.ORDER_NO, 0) AS ORDER_NO, NVL(OD.PRODUCT_SEQ, 0) AS PRODUCT_SEQ, NVL(P.PRODUCT_NAME, '') AS PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(OD.ORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, 0) AS ORDER_DETAIL_QUANTITY, NVL(OD.ORDER_DETAIL_PRICE, 0) AS ORDER_DETAIL_PRICE, NVL(OD.STATUS, 'N') AS STATUS FROM ORDER_DETAIL OD, PRODUCT P WHERE OD.ORDER_NO IN ( SELECT ORDER_NO FROM A_ORDER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} ) AND OD.PRODUCT_SEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ ORDER BY OD.ORDER_NO DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(OD.ORDER_NO) AS COUNT FROM ORDER_DETAIL OD, PRODUCT P WHERE OD.ORDER_NO IN ( SELECT ORDER_NO FROM A_ORDER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND ORDER_NO = #{value} ) AND OD.PRODUCT_SEQ = P.PRODUCT_SEQ

SELECT ORDER_NO, USER_ID, PRODUCT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PAY_REAL_PRICE, PAY_POINT_PRICE, PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, STATUS, CNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.ORDER_NO AS ORDER_NO, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.PRODUCT_SEQ, 0) AS PRODUCT_SEQ, NVL(P.PRODUCT_NAME, '') AS PRODUCT_NAME, NVL(B.PAY_REAL_PRICE, 0) AS PAY_REAL_PRICE, NVL(B.PAY_POINT_PRICE, 0) AS PAY_POINT_PRICE, NVL(B.PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, 0) AS PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, NVL(B.STATUS, 'N') AS STATUS, NVL(B.CNT, 1) AS CNT FROM PRODUCT P,( SELECT A.ORDER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.PRODUCT_SEQ, A.PAY_REAL_PRICE, A.PAY_POINT_PRICE, A.PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, A.STATUS, A.CNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P.ORDER_NO, P.PAY_REAL_PRICE ORDER BY P.ORDER_NO DESC) AS RNK, P.ORDER_NO, O.PRODUCT_SEQ, P.USER_ID, P.PAY_REAL_PRICE, P.PAY_POINT_PRICE, P.PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, P.STATUS, ( SELECT COUNT(D.ORDER_NO) FROM ORDER_DETAIL D WHERE O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO ) AS CNT FROM PAY P, ORDER_DETAIL O WHERE O.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.USER_ID = #{userId} ) A WHERE RNK = 1 ) B WHERE P.PRODUCT_SEQ = B.PRODUCT_SEQ ORDER BY B.ORDER_NO DESC ) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(B.ORDER_NO) AS COUNT FROM PRODUCT P,( SELECT A.ORDER_NO, A.USER_ID, A.PRODUCT_SEQ, A.PAY_REAL_PRICE, A.PAY_POINT_PRICE, A.PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, A.STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P.ORDER_NO, P.PAY_REAL_PRICE ORDER BY P.ORDER_NO DESC) AS RNK, P.ORDER_NO, O.PRODUCT_SEQ, P.USER_ID, P.PAY_REAL_PRICE, P.PAY_POINT_PRICE, P.PAY_TOTAL_PRICE, P.STATUS FROM PAY P, ORDER_DETAIL O WHERE O.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.USER_ID = #{value} ) A WHERE RNK = 1 ) B WHERE P.PRODUCT_SEQ = B.PRODUCT_SEQ
SELECT NVL(PRODUCT_NAME,'') AS PRODUCT_NAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ = #{value}

SELECT VR_SEQ, USER_ID, CATEGORY_NO, VR_TITLE, VR_CONTENT, VR_TOTAL_CNT, VR_START_PRICE, STATUS, REG_DATE, VR_START_DATE, VR_END_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, VR_SEQ, USER_ID, CATEGORY_NO, VR_TITLE, VR_CONTENT, VR_TOTAL_CNT, VR_START_PRICE, STATUS, REG_DATE, VR_START_DATE, VR_END_DATE FROM ( SELECT VR_SEQ, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(CATEGORY_NO,'')AS CATEGORY_NO, NVL(VR_TITLE, '') AS VR_TITLE, NVL(VR_CONTENT, '') AS VR_CONTENT, NVL(VR_TOTAL_CNT, 0) AS VR_TOTAL_CNT, NVL(VR_START_PRICE, 0) AS VR_START_PRICE, NVL(STATUS, 'N') AS STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(VR_START_DATE, '') AS VR_START_DATE, NVL(VR_END_DATE, '') AS VR_END_DATE FROM VOTE_UPLOAD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT RNUM, QA_SEQ, USER_ID, ADM_ID, QA_TITLE, QA_CONTENT, QA_GROUP, QA_ORDER, QA_INDENT, QA_PARENT, REG_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, QA_SEQ, USER_ID, ADM_ID, QA_TITLE, QA_CONTENT, QA_GROUP, QA_ORDER, QA_INDENT, QA_PARENT, REG_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT QA_SEQ, NVL(Q.USER_ID,'') AS USER_ID, NVL(ADM_ID,'') AS ADM_ID, NVL(QA_TITLE,'') AS QA_TITLE, NVL(QA_CONTENT,'') AS QA_CONTENT, NVL(QA_GROUP,'') AS QA_GROUP, NVL(QA_ORDER,'') AS QA_ORDER, NVL(QA_INDENT,'') AS QA_INDENT, NVL(QA_PARENT,'') AS QA_PARENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'') AS REG_DATE, Q.STATUS AS STATUS FROM QNA_BOARD Q, A_USER U WHERE QA_GROUP IN (SELECT QA_SEQ FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y') AND Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID(+) ORDER BY QA_GROUP DESC, QA_ORDER ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(QA_SEQ) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE QA_GROUP IN (SELECT QA_SEQ FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y')

SELECT Q.QA_SEQ AS QA_SEQ, Q.USER_ID AS USER_ID, NVL(QA_TITLE,'') AS QA_TITLE, CASE WHEN U.USER_NICK IS NULL THEN '관리자' WHEN U.USER_NICK IS NOT NULL THEN U.USER_NICK END AS USER_NICK, NVL(QA_CONTENT,'') AS QA_CONTENT, REG_DATE FROM QNA_BOARD Q, A_USER U WHERE QA_SEQ = #{value} AND Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID(+)

SELECT AUC_CUR_SEQ, VR_SEQ, VR_TITLE, CATEGORY_NO, USER_ID, AUC_CUR_BUY_TIME, AUC_CUR_PRICE, STATUS FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, AUC_CUR_SEQ, VR_SEQ, CATEGORY_NO, USER_ID, VR_TITLE, AUC_CUR_BUY_TIME, AUC_CUR_PRICE, STATUS FROM(SELECT AUC_CUR_SEQ, NVL(V.VR_SEQ,0) AS VR_SEQ, NVL(V.VR_TITLE,'') AS VR_TITLE, NVL(V.CATEGORY_NO, 00) AS CATEGORY_NO, C.USER_ID AS USER_ID, NVL(TO_CHAR(C.AUC_CUR_BUY_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS AUC_CUR_BUY_TIME, NVL(C.AUC_CUR_PRICE,0) AS AUC_CUR_PRICE, NVL(C.STATUS,'N') AS STATUS FROM AUC_CUR C, AUCTION A, VOTE_UPLOAD V WHERE C.AUC_SEQ = A.AUC_SEQ AND A.VR_SEQ = V.VR_SEQ AND C.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY AUC_CUR_BUY_TIME DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(AUC_CUR_SEQ) FROM AUC_CUR C, AUCTION A, VOTE_UPLOAD V WHERE C.AUC_SEQ = A.AUC_SEQ AND A.VR_SEQ = V.VR_SEQ AND C.USER_ID = #{value}

SELECT VR_TITLE, CATEGORY_NO, AUC_START_TIME, AUC_BUY_PRICE, VR_SEQ FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, VR_TITLE, CATEGORY_NO, AUC_START_TIME, AUC_BUY_PRICE, VR_SEQ FROM (SELECT VR_TITLE, A.CATEGORY_NO AS CATEGORY_NO, TO_CHAR(AUC_START_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS AUC_START_TIME, AUC_BUY_PRICE, A.VR_SEQ AS VR_SEQ FROM AUCTION A, VOTE_UPLOAD V WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.VR_SEQ = V.VR_SEQ ORDER BY AUC_START_TIME DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(AUC_SEQ) FROM AUCTION A, VOTE_UPLOAD V WHERE A.USER_ID = #{value} AND A.STATUS = 'N' AND A.VR_SEQ = V.VR_SEQ

SELECT AE_CUR_SEQ, AE_SEQ, USER_ID, AE_TITLE, AE_CUR_PRICE, AE_CUR_BUY_TIME, STATUS FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, AE_CUR_SEQ, AE_SEQ, USER_ID, AE_TITLE, AE_CUR_PRICE, AE_CUR_BUY_TIME, STATUS FROM(SELECT AE_CUR_SEQ, NVL(A.AE_SEQ, 0) AS AE_SEQ, NVL(C.USER_ID,'') AS USER_ID, NVL(A.AE_TITLE,'') AS AE_TITLE, NVL(AE_CUR_PRICE,'') AS AE_CUR_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(AE_CUR_BUY_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') AS AE_CUR_BUY_TIME, NVL(C.STATUS,'') AS STATUS FROM AUC_EVENT A, AUC_EVENT_CUR C WHERE A.AE_SEQ = C.AE_SEQ AND C.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY AE_CUR_BUY_TIME DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(AE_CUR_SEQ) FROM AUC_EVENT A, AUC_EVENT_CUR C WHERE A.AE_SEQ = C.AE_SEQ AND C.USER_ID = #{value}
